messages.text:
LGTM

On Tue, May 15, 2012 at 9:56 AM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> cmd/go: fix typo
>
> Fixes issue 3619.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6211055/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6211055/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/cmd/go/doc.go
>  M src/cmd/go/help.go
>
>
> Index: src/cmd/go/doc.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/cmd/go/doc.go
> +++ b/src/cmd/go/doc.go
> @@ -546,7 +546,7 @@
>
>  Remote import path syntax
>
> -An import path (see 'go help importpath') denotes a package
> +An import path (see 'go help packages') denotes a package
>  stored in the local file system.  Certain import paths also
>  describe how to obtain the source code for the package using
>  a revision control system.
> Index: src/cmd/go/help.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/cmd/go/help.go
> +++ b/src/cmd/go/help.go
> @@ -138,7 +138,7 @@
>
>        <meta name="go-import" content="import-prefix vcs repo-root">
>
> -The import-prefix is the import path correponding to the repository
> +The import-prefix is the import path corresponding to the repository
>  root. It must be a prefix or an exact match of the package being
>  fetched with "go get". If it's not an exact match, another http
>  request is made at the prefix to verify the <meta> tags match.
>
>
>

while you're here can you also remove the # from the %#q you added in
the last CL?

-rob

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
sure.  the # was there before, fwiw

*** Submitted as 9942561a3fe2 ***

cmd/go: fix typo

Fixes issue 3619.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6211055
